_sText:
This map was developed a long time ago (4-5 years) but never finished. Now I had the time and motivation to fix all the bugs I've noticed and give it a better look.
The theme was based on the catholic-related beliefs of what happens in the afterlife. I am no Catholic myself, but have known the main "afterlife" background since I was young, and then decided to make a visual representation of it.

The player will have three options to choose:
  • Heaven (most of the map is directed upwards, with boosts that push the player up)
  • Hell (classic surf, with lots of obstacles and one horizontal ramp in the end)
  • Purgatory (small but tedious and repetitive as it should be)
Purgatory's ending/jail is by far the coolest one, as it's set up in a maze with inumerous traps, that can be triggered (or not) by the player who finished the level first.
